credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Design for a bed in Roman style
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash, yellow-green watercolor, on white laid paper
description: Daybed, hangings suspended from a domed canopy which is decorated with clusters of feathers. Fringed hangings are caught into bows. Frame of bed in Louis XIV style. Scale below.
name: drawing
